articles.description: JSW Steel’s daily trend is bullish to sideways. The RSI for monthly, weekly and daily are showing bullish momentum. Based on option chain analysis, the range is between 800 and 900. Let’s plan a trade around this.

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Hero MotoCorp shares skid 3% on flat sales in December - Moneycontrol
articles.description: From January to December 2023, the company has sold more than 54.99 lakh units, marking a growth of 5 percent
articles.content:
Shares of Hero MotoCorp Limited traded 3 percent lower at Rs 3,974 early on January 3 after the company announced flat sales in December.
The world's largest two-wheeler company sold 3,93,952 units … [+1367 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Oil prices rise on disruption fears after latest Red Sea attack - The Economic Times
articles.description: Brent crude was up 49 cents, or 0.6%, to $77.53 a barrel at 1432 GMT. U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude was up 36 cents, or 0.5%, at $72.01, after both benchmarks gained around $2 in earlier trading.
articles.content: Oil prices rose in the first session of the new year, boosted by potential disruption to Middle Eastern supply after the latest attack on a container ship in the Red Sea, and by Chinese demand hopes.… [+1664 chars]
